content: Hi, I'm running the server inside docker, and the server/postgres etc starts running when I start the docker container; this is a problem now that I want to run the tests, because I'm required to shut down the server for the backend/casper tests to run. So I'm looking to shut down the server, but remain inside the container shell
ok maybe that';s not what I need
turns out there is a test especially for docker
and I thiink that's what I"m needing
